trans-unit.source: Represents the strip lines on a chart.
trans-unit.target: 表示圖表的帶狀線。

trans-unit.source: Strip lines, or strips, are horizontal or vertical ranges that shade the background of a chart in regular or custom intervals.
trans-unit.target: 帶狀線或階梯狀，會加上陰影的規則或自訂的間隔中的圖表背景的水平或垂直範圍。

trans-unit.source: You can use strip lines to:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用區域線：

trans-unit.source: Improve readability for looking up individual values on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 改善可讀性，查閱在圖表上的個別值。

trans-unit.source: Separate data points when reading the chart.
trans-unit.target: 在讀取圖表的個別資料點。

trans-unit.source: Highlight dates that occur at regular intervals, for example, to identify weekend data points.
trans-unit.target: 反白顯示定期出現，例如，若要識別週末資料點的日期。

trans-unit.source: Highlight a specific key range of data.
trans-unit.target: 反白顯示特定索引鍵範圍的資料。

trans-unit.source: Add a threshold line at a specific constant value.
trans-unit.target: 加入臨界值線條在特定的常數值。

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object can either be drawn once, or repeatedly, for a given interval.
trans-unit.target: 單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>物件可以是繪製一次，或重複，在給定的間隔。

trans-unit.source: This action is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a value of zero is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property, one strip line will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 當為零的值指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性、 一個寬帶繪製線條。

trans-unit.source: When a non-zero value is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property, a strip line will be drawn repeatedly at each given interval.
trans-unit.target: 當為非零的值指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性，將會重複繪製帶狀線，在每個指定的間隔。

trans-unit.source: The location where a strip line is drawn is also affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 繪製帶狀線的位置的位置也會受到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffsetType%2A>帶狀線的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Strip lines are always associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 帶狀線一律會與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>物件。

trans-unit.source: They can be added at both design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以將它們加入的設計階段和執行的階段。

trans-unit.source: To add a horizontal or vertical line to display a threshold, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的水平或垂直列顯示臨界值，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>0.0 的值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This will result in a line being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致正在繪製一條線。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> properties for the color, width and style of the line.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>色彩、 寬度和線條的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: No chart background properties (`Back*`) are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 沒有圖表背景屬性 (`Back*`) 時使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Text%2A> property of the strip line to associate text with a strip line.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Text%2A>帶狀線文字與帶狀線的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The placement and orientation of this text can be controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextAlignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 位置和方向，這段文字可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextAlignment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When multiple strip lines are defined for the same axis, it is possible that the strip lines will overlap.
trans-unit.target: 針對相同的軸定義了多個區域線，很可能會重疊帶狀線。

trans-unit.source: The Z-order of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> objects is determined by their order of occurrence in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 疊置順序的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>物件由其訂單中項目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: This means that the first occurrence is drawn first; the second occurrence is drawn second, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這表示第一次出現的第一次; 繪製第二個會繪製為第二個，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Strip lines are not supported for the following chart types: Pie, Doughnut, Funnel, Pyramid, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polar and Radar.
trans-unit.target: 區域線不適用於下列圖表類型： 圓形圖、 環圈圖、 漏斗圖、 金字塔圖，Kagi、 ThreeLineBreak、 PointAndFigure、 極座標圖和雷達圖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.White" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.White" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set a gradient for the strip line, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定帶狀線的漸層，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—in other words, set the alpha value to 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此色彩為"透明"— 亦即，設定為 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給項目的背景。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，背景會變成透明。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A> property will determine the color of the line, not this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 時，會繪製一條線和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>屬性會決定線條，不是這個屬性的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A> property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性會決定是否圖表項目會顯示漸層，以及方向的漸層中，如果使用。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用漸層色彩：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>屬性來設定主要色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性來設定次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: Set this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A> property of the chart element to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 設定此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A>所需的漸層樣式的圖表元素的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。

trans-unit.source: The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 所設定的影線類型中使用的兩個色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents an image file's URL.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImage%2A> property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImage%2A>屬性定義許多的圖表元素的背景影像路徑，而是絕對或相對 URL。

trans-unit.source: To position this image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要將此映像，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定一種色彩顯示為 「 透明 」 映像時藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: 映像可以是任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.
trans-unit.target: 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景影像的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle.TopLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle.TopLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定帶狀線; 的背景影像的對齊方式只套用在下列情況才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about available alignments, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的對齊方式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>列舉主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繪製背景影像時，會被透明色彩取代的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: 將以透明方式顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線背景影像的繪製模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> integer enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> 整數列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Tile" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Tile" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會決定如何顯示的影像。也就是說，並排顯示，縮放等等。

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line.
trans-unit.target: 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合週框的帶狀線。

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從左上角開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 關於可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>列舉主題。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>, the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>，其中繪製影像的位置取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線背景的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會決定次要背景色彩，許多圖表物件，並套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值來設定背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property determines the color of the hatching lines.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用影線，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性會決定影線線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的圖表元素背景的漸層色彩：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>屬性來設定主要色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性來設定次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性所需的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這個屬性如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設定為 0.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property setting that will determine the color of the line.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>物件設定為 0.0，會繪製一條線，而且它是此屬性而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>屬性設定會決定線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value that determines the border style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 列舉值，決定帶狀線的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定用於框線的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted or some variation of solid and dotted.
trans-unit.target: 行可以是實線、 虛線或一些不同的實心和小數點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that determines the width of the strip line's border, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，決定帶狀線框線的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: This property is measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="False" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="False" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font used for the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於帶狀線文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> value that represents the font of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 值，表示帶狀線文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the text color of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，表示帶狀線的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any valid ARGB color for this property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定任何有效的 ARGB 色彩，此屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a text value is specified for the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 文字值，指定帶狀線時，這個屬性才適用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval for a strip line, and determines if the strip line is drawn once or repeatedly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的間隔，並且決定帶狀線只要繪製一次還是重複地繪製。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the interval between strip lines.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="double" /> 值，表示帶狀線之間的間隔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property to a value of zero, one strip line will be displayed, with a width specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性設為零，一條帶狀線的值將會顯示，且由指定寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> to a value of other than zero, multiple strip lines will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>將不會顯示值設為非零，多個帶狀線。

trans-unit.source: The unit that is used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的單位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性由定義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines, tick marks, strip lines and axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線、刻度標記、帶狀線與座標軸標籤的位移。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the interval offset.
trans-unit.target: 表示間隔位移的 <see langword="double" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: 值永遠不會影響上次要刻度和格線的間隔位移<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A> property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>屬性設定會定義位移的度量單位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> can be a negative value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>可以是負數的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Auto` (`0`).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`Auto`(`0`)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval offset type of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的間隔位移類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: 表示間隔類型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>; the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>; 實際值，這個屬性由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval type of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine" /> 物件的間隔類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: 表示間隔類型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: Interval types can be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>, in which case the type depends on: the X-value or Y-value types of the plotted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects—depending on which axis the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> objects belong to—and the axis scale.
trans-unit.target: 間隔類型可以設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>，在此情況下類型取決於： X 值或 Y 值的類型繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>物件 — 根據哪個座標軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>物件屬於 — 和軸刻度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property determines how often a strip or line is drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>屬性決定繪製寬帶或線條的頻率。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得帶狀線的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示帶狀線的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="double" /> 值，決定要繪製帶狀線還是線段。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to a value less than zero, otherwise an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不能設定為值小於零，否則將會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> property settings for its color, width and style.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為 0.0，會導致畫;這一行會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>屬性設定其色彩、 寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何`Back*`此類別中的屬性並加以使用時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property to a value greater than zero, a strip will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性大於零的值，將建立區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>屬性只能套用至該區域; 框線的所有`Back*`然後會使用屬性之背景屬性的區域。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性為大於 0.0，單位由相關的軸刻度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth" /> 屬性的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that indicates the width type.
trans-unit.target: 表示寬度類型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the units used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定所使用的單位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Weeks> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property to one (1.0).
trans-unit.target: 比方說，若要設定的帶狀線，代表 「 一週 」，您可以設定此屬性為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Weeks>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>屬性設為其中 (1.0)。

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of this property from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto> to a <xref:System.DateTime> value when the relevant axis scale uses a <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更從這個屬性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType.Auto>至<xref:System.DateTime>值時使用相關的軸刻度<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the text of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示帶狀線的文字。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add text to a strip line.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性將文字加入帶狀線。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> value that represents the alignment of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> 值，表示帶狀線文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text line alignment of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線文字行的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> value that represents the alignment of the text line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> 值，表示文字行的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字方向。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextOrientation" /> value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextOrientation" /> 值，表示文字方向的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextOrientation.Auto>, the text is oriented based on the chart type.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextOrientation.Auto>，文字的方向根據圖表類型。

trans-unit.source: For all X-Y chart types other than Bar, X-axis strip line text is oriented horizontally from left to right on the bottom of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 所有 X，Y 圖表類型以外的列，x 軸的帶狀線文字都是以水平方式從左到右的帶狀線的底部導向。

trans-unit.source: For Bar charts, X-axis strip line text is oriented vertically from top to bottom to the right of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: 橫條圖是垂直方向往右邊帶狀線的 x 軸寬帶線文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定帶狀線的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the tooltip of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示帶狀線的工具提示。
